titleStmt.title: A vindication of the clergy from the contempt imposed upon them by the author of The grounds and occasions of the contempt of the clergy and religion with some short reflections on his further observations.
titleStmt.author: Eachard, John, 1636?-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andr. Clark for Hen. Brome ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Eachard by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
